website_summaries.verdict: This ball may have delicate colors, but it's tough enough for serious street play.
pros: Wide channel design for grip and feel
Easy to spot at the gym
Works well on wooden courts, too
cons: Do not leave out in the elements

website_summaries.verdict: Girls will love this feminine spin on the classic youth street ball.
pros: NBA Street Basketball designed for competitive street play
Durable basketball that will last a long time
Wide channel design for incredible grip and feel
cons: Colors may fade if left out in the elements

website_summaries.verdict: Great-looking basketball at an intermediate size that kids are sure to love.
pros: Basketball designed for outdoor play with a tough exterior cover that also gives you a great grip in all kinds of weather
Purple and pink ball appeals to young players
Uses an intermediate size, which is aimed at women's game and for young players
cons: May not stand up well if it strikes any sharp objects

customer_reviews.title: Great orange rubber mass for swooshing into a netted hole.
customer_reviews.text: I love balls. I love shooting them into them netted holes. Makes me feel all fuzzy inside. I also love dribbling them. Something about seeing the rubber his my skin. So romantic. And this ball has such a fantastic grip. It fits perfectly into my palm like a horse fits into a horse carriage. I have no doubt the orange man would make a perfect companion if I ever was stranded on an island. I would always keep him by my side and never let him leave me. He would be my glowing light, my star, my partner and my heroine. My orange rubber makes for a great swoosh.
customer_reviews.author: Oktagenarian

customer_reviews.title: Bought for gentle use in our driveway by 8 year ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for gentle use in our driveway by 8 year old. Shipped with a leak and became completely busted by second use. Outer surface separated from air bladder. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: stonyhill

customer_reviews.title: Good Grip basketball for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Perfect texture allowed for some good grip even when my palms got sweaty and my knees got weak and my arms got heavy. The ball came completely inflated and is the official size. Been using it for about 3 hours every day for heavy use for about the last 2 weeks and no sign of wear. Will update if the ball starts to peel and other signs of wear show up.
customer_reviews.author: Monish Naidu

customer_reviews.title: Grip consistent after a year, great outdoor ball
customer_reviews.text: I just received my second ball after having had the first one for over a year. The thing that astounded me the most was the the grip was almost identical. The new ball was obviously a little more defined but the old one felt just as secure. I only use this ball to play outdoors and it's held up really well. I sometimes pounded it or kicked it when I got angry which is why I had to buy a new one because the ball started to warp, but that took a year For there to be any noticeable change In shape. For $13 this ball is a steal. One hundred percent recommend if you're playing outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Arguello

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Solid, quality construction, ready to go right out of the box. Awesome inexpensive ball for outdoor courts. My dog popped it within five minutes of playing though so would not recommend for Air Bud wannabes
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Who knows?
customer_reviews.text: Came deflated, folded, shoved in an envelope. Could be a complete dud for all I know. Other reviews state it comes ready to use straight out of the box..... Didn’t read anywhere that it wouldn’t be inflated when delivered. Not super happy or impressed at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: GranneeT

customer_reviews.title: I actually liked this ball a lot when I got it
customer_reviews.text: I actually liked this ball a lot when I got it. Great grip, nice bounce for outside courts, starts to wear kinda quick but hey, for $13 I could buy one every six months and still be happy... Unfortunately it didn't last a month. Its been about 3 weeks and the ball has begun to warp and has lost its round shape. It's now more oblong and is unusable. Only used maybe 8-10 times on smooth concrete and stored indoors. I wish they still sold the NBA Street Pro balls
customer_reviews.author: reviews of the fooot

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value! I originally bought a $30 indoor/outdoor ball which was nice, but after a year playing outside it lost a lot of grip and needed replacement. So I decided to try this one which seems like it is made for playing on asphalt. I was afraid it would be one of those very rubbery balls because the price was so low but I was pleasantly surprised. It has a nice grip and doesn't seem cheap at all. It doesn't quite have that nice indoor leather ball feel but perfect for an everyday outside ball.
customer_reviews.author: Michael lynch

customer_reviews.title: Knock off
customer_reviews.text: This pink and purple ball sucks. I bought a version from target years ago and it was the bright pink and purple like the picture shows and had good street padding on the ball. The ball I received is a knock off. It has dull ugly colors and the texture of the ball is terrible and has literally no grip. The ball didn’t even come in packaging it was literally just a ball in a box.. I must have ordered from some 3rd party seller or something but this is NOT a Spalding ball.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Perfect for my daughter who is starting to play basketball
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old daughter loves this basketball! She just started playing on a local team, and because she is so interested, we wanted her to have her own ball to practice with at home. This one is affordable, does the perfect job for her needs, bounces really well, and is distinctive from others. She has 2 brothers, and she always likes to have something that is just for her. It's actually a well-made ball that will last a while in our family.
customer_reviews.author: ShannMarie

customer_reviews.title: Massive leak on seam < 3 weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I was very satisfied with the product. After three weeks of use, the rubber seam around the entire circumference of the ball suddenly began to leak. I recognize this ball is inexpensive and that, based on the other good reviews, I probably received a defective ball. Nonetheless it is certainly not a product that I could recommend based on my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Lucinacharity

customer_reviews.title: Good basketball but is not the colors shown!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughters birthday, she’s ten and has wanted to try out for basketball. Thought it would be good for her to get out and play with. Overall a good basketball but really disappointed with the color it showed up as. Was pretty deceiving with the pictures shown, bright vibrant pink and purple. But shows up looking like it was put in the sun for a year and had faded. I got this particular one because of the colors, so that’s a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Bad bounce and doesn't keep the pressure
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was a nice basketball. Dribbling at home was fun. Then I went to the court and the ball was to soft to dribbel (within 1 day). After using a pump the ball would bounce to high of the rim after a shot. After finding the right pressure it was nice to play with (for a day), because the next day the pressure wasn't like the day before. Wouldn't recommend this ball.
customer_reviews.author: Dave JAL

customer_reviews.title: Can’t Be Beat At This Pricepoint
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I used to play basketball every night but I haven’t touched a ball for over 15 years. This changed a week ago. I bought myself this brand new basketball and play outside on the courts. The ball performed as expected and I have zero complaints with it for the price point. When this one wears out, I will buy the same thing. It shipped with very little packaging but was fully inflated. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MRM

customer_reviews.title: easy to bounce
customer_reviews.text: This ball is one of the best for being an official size ball. It is a rubber type and easy to bounce. I compared it to two other basketballs we had and this one bounces the best and my 4th grader picks this one every time we play. She takes it to school for recess and even her boy classmates told her they prefer to use her ball because to was better than any of the others. lol. So for the price and how it bounces and feels I will definitely buy this one again. I know it will hold up but I don't want to use the harder basketballs either now when shoot hoops.
customer_reviews.author: Cat339

customer_reviews.title: Looks like an NBA ball, plays like it belongs in the G league.
customer_reviews.text: This ball flat out sucks. I've returned one already due to it losing its shape after a few hours of playing INDOORS. The replacement is doing the same thing and the quality of the two is night and day as the first one lost the paint on the stripes and had its fill valve sticking out, causing the ball to bounce in random directions whenever it landed on that side of the ball. The replacement ball has now also lost its shape after keeping both of them within their psi range. Shame on Spalding for peddling these garbage basketballs to children who couldn't afford an authentic NBA game ball.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: to some that may not be a big deal but to my 7 year old who love bright colors
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old daughter's exact words, " Mom when I saw the color online, it looks soo much brighter, the color is different" I double checked the color and yes it is different. The colors are much lighter in person as oppose to brighter. Now, to some that may not be a big deal but to my 7 year old who love bright colors, it was! I gave a 2 star because nevertheless the ball is nice but the color is a bit misleading
customer_reviews.author: Vash

customer_reviews.title: Got the basketball as expected
customer_reviews.text: It's a good quality basketball that can actually be used for outside. It's not the BEST quality in the world, but for the price it's a good deal and can actually be used to shoot baskets. Be sure to only order specifically from Amazon to ensure you get the quality basketball as described. Otherwise you might not get a good one as expected. It came ready to use. Didn't need more air. If it's on sale, worth getting. Got it for $12.99.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: THESE LEAK AIR!
customer_reviews.text: Now that the weather is warming up in New Hampshire I am using the 2 balls. They BOTH do NOT hold the air, but slowly leak air over a 3 or 4 day period. Not sure if I can get a refund or an exchange at this point. Not worth the hassle of trying to call Spalding. If Spalding sees this review, and you let me return, I will gladly change my review rating.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Black

customer_reviews.title: Durability is unmatched
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other big brands before for basketballs and this one has stuck with me the longest, in terms of staying in great shape and not losing it's grip over time. I haven't had to buy another basketball since I purchased this last year! Dribbling with it feels smooth enough to be able to comfortably do what you want, and it's grip is secure enough that it doesn't just slip right out of your hand. Shooting with the ball feels natural and doesn't stick to your hand or causes any issues. Overall I would really recommend this ball for general or everyday use. These are meant to last. Really worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Negan

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold air
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as an Easter gift for my son. When it came in, it was semi flat. It looked like it was done on purpose so that it would fit in the box. It wont hold air. We have had to air it up multiple times and the air just slowly leaks out. I sent feedback to Spaulding and they sent me a 30%off and told me to use it if I decide to purchase from them again. Im not going to be purchasing more defective basketballs from them. At this point, I will have to buy him another basketball but it wont be this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bennett

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Decent ball for beginners. I actually only used this ball for indoors until the recent pandemic. I started using this ball indoors and started seeing the grip and lining of the ball lose its touch. I only had this ball for a couple of months and went to the court about 2-3 times a week. A few uses in, it started deteriorating and I already knew it was a cheap ball. I would highly recommend keeping this ball indoors even though it says outdoor. After my first uses of it outdoors, it just worsened the condition and now its just a faded orange rubber ball that can be mistaken for a dodgeball from afar.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Perlas

customer_reviews.title: Ready for the NBA
customer_reviews.text: This ball improved my game tremendously. I've never played basketball on a team, but I am definitely on the same level as LeBron since I got this ball.
customer_reviews.author: Lobster Claw

customer_reviews.title: Bought this basketball and turned into Kobi Byrant overnight
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, I just picked up this Spalding basketball to shoot some hoops and get a bit more activity in my routine but what I wasn't expecting was to turn into the next Kobi Byrant AND Labron James overnight! Suddenly I can reach for the sky and do sick NBA2k moves. All by buddies are impressed with my rebounding, lay up, slam-dunking (I could never even reach the rim before) skills. I want to thank Spalding for my new skills, I'm going to quit my job and try out for the Gold State Warriors later today. Oh the basketball itself is great too, it's round and rebounds well. I'd get it again.
customer_reviews.author: Persona

customer_reviews.title: Great ball!
customer_reviews.text: The complex I living in has a hoop and my toddler likes to be picked up so she can dunk the ball. For almost a year now we've been using her soccer ball and I decided it was time to switch to real basketball. I honestly had no idea there were Youth Size basketballs so that was a pleasant surprise, though now that I think of it, it makes sense. My toddler is clearly still a bit too small for this ball but she loves it and it's helping me to teach her about different balls, their sports, etc. Couldn't be happier. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Jon M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Ball!
customer_reviews.text: I love to shoot hoops at the gym. The balls there are older (not a lot of bounce left in many of them) and they are size 7 which is what the men use. The size 6 ball is what I used when playing high school girls basketball. I love this ball. It came full of air and ready to use. It's easy for me to spot my own ball and the gym and the guys are NOT wanting to steal my ball and use it. I don't know why they aren't using my pink and purple basketball HA! I'm hitting 3 pointers again and loving it. I highly recommend this ball for females of any age. You'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Spalding Streat Basketball I ordered. The first one could not hold air after 1 year+ of usage. I tried to replace it with another valve but did not work well so I tossed it away. The 2nd one is great. The third one came with part of surface being very uneven. Over-pumping it and let it sit for a week made it better so I did not return it. Now I hope these two will not have bad valves.
customer_reviews.author: FC

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good basketball. Other people at the outdoor court preferred my Spalding basketball over theirs. It has very good grip and is perfectly round. Nice weight. It came half inflated in a box. Good way to ship if you ask me. This was a great investment. If you’re stuck over which ball to get I’d recommend this one. Consider buying the Franklin sports ball maintenance kit with this ball. You’ll need to inflate the ball and know if it’s at the correct psi and this kit does the job, and it’s easy to take with you if you want some extra insurance or want to adjust psi.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Miller

customer_reviews.title: Still good but not last long
customer_reviews.text: I remember when I was young the Spaulding is the most famous for basketball and everyone want to have one. On the thanksgiving sale, I bought one for my kid and now I felt the quality is a little bit different. Up to now already several weeks, the rubber on the skin is almost flat and so it is very slippery to hold now. I know the outdoor ball is like that but it happens too quick although I play everyday. Ok, I have to say that as this price, this is still good and when it was new, it is very comfortable to hold. Just have to replace it soon if you are picky.
customer_reviews.author: Wasabi~~

customer_reviews.title: Thought Spalding would be good...
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be good quality, but it went flat before I could even use it! I donated it to a school as well which was worse, since the kids wanted to use it but it was flat...
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Trash Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This ball is absolute trash it will deflate so easily but feel so bouncy in hotter days this basketball is NOT official weight I tried playing with this ball for a month and completely screwed over my shot due to the heavy ball. BOTTOM LINE do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Ste. Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good ball for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for kids. Out of the box they are great. It has been about a month since we got them and the wear is noticeable. Maybe boys play at least an hour a day, sometimes two hours. We have an exposed aggregate driveway which is very rough on basketballs. I suspect they would do much better on a smoother surface. When these are worn out, I will probably buy two more. They are very good balls for the price.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Leaks air after only 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for outdoor use knowing it was an outdoor ball. I didn't care about the texture or weight, just the size. The size is correct but it has started leaking already. I need to pump the ball up every other day. Its only 6 months old and wasnt used using the winter months, so only about 2 months of actual use.
customer_reviews.author: JET

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised, feels a bit cheap
customer_reviews.text: Had to order this ball twice, the first time it came it literally look like a $5 ball. Second time it came the ball is extra grippy. Bought it from Spalding but for some reason the ball came not as advertised. It was disappointing, overall use for outdoor court is good but I would definitely recommend spending a little bit more money and getting a nicer ball. Not what Spalding quality should be, and the ball does look a bit cheap.
customer_reviews.author: rahul

customer_reviews.title: Used a handful of times and ball went flat.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two balls, one of them came deflated. I aired it up and it went flat in the same day. Amazon was great, they replaced it. Used the 2 balls maybe a handful of times and one of the balls went flat again. Will not be buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Great for a gift
customer_reviews.text: Was giving this as a gift for a foster child at Christmas, through our church. It was the exact one he wanted so I'm hoping he liked it. Only weird thing was that it didn't come in a box or anything. Just was on my porch one day. I live in a pretty remote small town so I doubt anyone came and took box or something, it was just strange. But ball was ok. I didn't really need to have a box for it anyhow! :)
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingCritic

customer_reviews.title: Received with a bump on the side.
customer_reviews.text: I forgot to take the photo before I threw it. I always play outside and as the name suggests I thought this ball was made for outdoors but I was wrong. I received the ball damaged. It was not perfect circle. It had a bump. Because I had no other ball I played with this for few days and the grip got thinner so fast. Waste of money. I dont think the expensive ones will work for me either as I play in concrete court. Molten basketball works good for me. Will try Wilson now.
customer_reviews.author: Johnlama

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good deal, solid outdoor ball, you should jump on it.
customer_reviews.text: At this price point, For an outdoor basketball to shoot around in the yard, you can’t go wrong. This is a very good deal. The ball comes already inflated. And, It has a very good grip. Let me be clear, for this price point this is almost a no brainer. I wouldn’t have any problem gifting this ball for someone to “shoot around in the yard and enjoy some outdoor basketball.” I bought the usef ball, I think I got a steal.
customer_reviews.author: HustonX

customer_reviews.title: Great giftA Fir teens.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the toy drive at Christmas, delivered at no charge with Amazon prime, very reasonable prices to buy several at once and those teenagers are really hard to buy for Christmas. I think you can’t go wrong with a sports ball. Too often on the toy drive we think of the little kids and leave out the big ones. I always buy for the big ones knowing the little ones are being taken care of. Last year I bought tablets and speakers
customer_reviews.author: Dennie

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Outdoor Basetkball
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good quality outdoor basketball after all mine were worn out. This was actually a very reasonable price and I thought I would try it out. I bought it about a year ago and it is still going strong. It is pretty durable and I only use it on the outdoor basketball court. The court is made of clay so it does not get too scuffed up. Great basketball, I will buy again when my current one gets worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Amit Patel

customer_reviews.title: Durable outdoor ball
customer_reviews.text: The price on this is great and so far this ball has outlasted many of the other outdoor balls I have. I use it all the time (I coach some HS ball and play with friends on my own time) and it hasn't shown much wear yet four months in. The ball feels good in your hands for an outdoor ball. Good grip. It does behave very much like a rubber ball....without being cheap....but it is bouncy and will bounce high and long on shots off the rim. I've had to deflate mine at times so it's not super bouncy. Overall a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Bearcat Esquire

customer_reviews.title: Good basketball.
customer_reviews.text: Just good quality, good balance and bounce, good for practicing dribbling and shooting. Feels good, and had no damage after playing on my rough driveway for a few hours. Easy to inflate and deflate to your liking. Good value, if you had to buy basketballs for a school, this is the definite winner. There are better basketballs out there, but they are expensive. If you're buying for casual reasons, this one is the one.
customer_reviews.author: yesnt

customer_reviews.title: Came without any packaging
customer_reviews.text: Great basketball but it arrived with absolutely no packaging. It was just rolling around in an amazon box. I was donating to a collection drive so it was odd to just see a ball without a package, as it might seem that it’s a used product. I wouldn’t recommend this particular item if it’s intended to be a gift due to the lack of packaging but if that’s not a concern, then this is a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: It came with a hole in the Spalding D letter.
customer_reviews.text: I awaited more than three weeks approx. to receive this item in Venezuela, and when I finally got it I noticed it had low aire pressure. I thought it was normal and I just filled it up, but it keeps loosing air pressure in a matter of hours. I put it under water to see where was the aire getting out and discovered a tiny hole in the Spalding D letter. Now, it will cost me more money to bring it back to the US than the basketball itself. So I'm pretty disappointed, I basically just lost my money.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Lecointere

customer_reviews.title: Youth Street Ball  Update 5/2/2020
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 year old daughter and it's a great fit for her size. It's much more manageable for her and it's lighter as well. I'm updating my review as I like the youth sized ball for my daughter, BUT the ball does not hold air pressure. I am constantly pumping air into this basketball each time we use it. Sometimes, the ball is completely flat.
customer_reviews.author: munchie

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this ball for two months and hardly used and it is already constantly deflating. Very annoying that I can't even return it.
customer_reviews.author: mdimaggi

customer_reviews.title: So pretty
customer_reviews.text: I feel cool. I have a pink & purple basketball. It's just like the orange basketballs in quality, size, & bounce, but much prettier.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kay

customer_reviews.title: Not grippy, I wanted to like it
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this basketball. But it is just not grippy at all. I found it was very slippery in my hands. It picked up way too much dust and dirt and whatever is on the outdoor courts. So I washed it with soap and water and a washcloth and sent it back. I was really disappointed. I just really like that it says NBA Street Ball, but unfortunately it's not much of a street ball IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymously

customer_reviews.title: Not fun
customer_reviews.text: The grip is amazing. It came flat pumped it up played for a few hours was great next time I opened trunk it was flat pumped it up again played a few hours following week it was flat again
customer_reviews.author: Scott Du Pont

customer_reviews.title: Ball goes flat everyday!!
customer_reviews.text: We have had the same brand, same ball that we got from Academy that was great for 2 years, before it lost all grip and had to replace it.... Instead of going to Academy again, we chose to order it on Amazon.... NOT from this seller EVER AGAIN!! Ball is going flat every day and has to be pumped up... going to go to Academy and get another one
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: Made it less than 24 hours before holes developed on seams.
customer_reviews.text: Ball looked great bit only made it 24 hours total. It's supposed to be an indoor/outdoor ball but after a single days use by two 12 year olds and a 10 year old the ball had two holes directly on the seems. I was watching them play so I can assure it was not something they were doing wrong that caused it unless dribbling and standard shooting isn't in the design plan for this ball! Will look for another brand for next purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Inflation valve inside the ball
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a a Christmas gift this past year. Upon opening the gift and bouncing a few times, we noticed there is a second inflation valve or other object inside the ball. This is annoying to bounce or handle the ball with this inside.
customer_reviews.author: B.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. But ....Don’t let your dog bite it :(
customer_reviews.text: This is/ was a great product. The only problem I had was my dog bit it and popped it :( No fault of the company. I went to the local store and purchased the same exact one. ( that’s what happens when your 105 pound German Shepard is able to get within reach of it) lol
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Leaky Ball won't hold air. 0 for 2
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty, does not hold air. First one arrived soft. Inflated to 8 pounds. Soft again in two days. Submerged it in pool; steady stream of tiny bubbles from around seam between valve and ball. Returned and replacement ball holds pressure for 6-7 days. Tiny leak at one of the seams. Based on 0 for 2 I do not rcommend
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Ed

customer_reviews.title: Won't Hold Air, Bad Seams😠
customer_reviews.text: The ball was a Christmas present for my Grandson with the portable net! The basketball hoop worked great but the ball won't hold air! All the seams are bad and after testing with a water bucket could see why! This is junk and Spalding needs to replace immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: This basketball and a football were purchased as a gift for a neighbor's son who loves sports. I dropped it off at their house on Christmas Eve so it could be opened early Christmas day. On Christmas, he ran up to me and gave me the biggest hug and said "thank you". I havent seen him bouncing thr basketball but based on his reaction, I would say that he loved both the basketball and football.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: For beginners-practice ball for schools
customer_reviews.text: If you take your basketball seriously pass on this. Felt like I was holding a balloon. $11 is too much for this. I played for the first time, came home and immediately placed an order for Spalding Zi/O $35. its okay for beginners who are learning how to play basketball etc. I will give it to some kid in need but my advice: pay more and get a proper ball....
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaddict

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth The Money!
customer_reviews.text: We do not like the cheap rubber feel of the ball. It also does not hold air for very long as I pumped it up on the first day of receiving dribbled it for 20 minutes and left it in my truck and within a week it was soft and losing air. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Rdgainesjr

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for young player
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great feel, and great look to this basketball. Perfect for that girl that loves pink and/or purple, and is excited about learning to play basketball. Basketball has a tacky enough feel that it allows easy control of the ball while shooting or dribbling. Works great in the gym, not sure how this would hold up on outdoor courts.
customer_reviews.author: dream

customer_reviews.title: A great schoolyard basketball at an unbeatable price
customer_reviews.text: I have bought dozens and dozens of basketballs for my kids over the years and this one is fantastic. Outdoors obviously, but not super thin or plasticky like many balls at this price. This ball has a nice basketball feel to it and seems much thicker and less 'tinny' on the bounce. Note that each of the balls I ordered came separately and inflated, ready to go. They also came in separate plain brown boxes which would have been great for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Schoenberg

customer_reviews.title: Basketball goes flat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ball for my son. It lasted three days before going flat with normal play on a concrete driveway. Unfortunately, I already threw out the box and it really isn't worth returning. I don't know if it is an official Spalding ball or an off market knock off. It is definitely not a street outdoor basketball!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold air.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. Arrived flat and won’t hold air. This was an Easter gift for my son and he just opened it yesterday to find it won’t hold air. Tried to do an Amazon return or exchange and it says it’s too late because it was ordered last month. Great, a flat basketball, just what ever kid wants.
customer_reviews.author: CBMet

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor ball
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for concrete. It’s lasted me one whole summer which is more than most balls last. I bought another to have on deck for the spring. Good value. Outdoor play expect little better than normal wear.
customer_reviews.author: Big Billy Style

customer_reviews.title: Great Grip and Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: I bought this basketball for my friend and I and it has been nothing but amazing! Finding a good outdoor basketball has been a struggle but this ball has met all of my standards. It comes pumped and ready to go, not to mention the fashionable logo, and it makes you feel like you're able to play for hours. All my friends like the grip and have already purchased one. The sale price made it even better.
customer_reviews.author: Khalil Sakalla

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Flat- defective product
customer_reviews.text: Ball arrived flat but we filled with air in hopes it was accidentally mailed out that way and not a defective product. Turns out it is a defective product and continues to lose air and go flat within hours of being filled, even with no use. Reached out to Spalding as Amazon suggested and hoping to get a replacement, and the opportunity to re-write this review based on a functioning product.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Not perfectly round. Ball rolls to the side when inflated.
customer_reviews.text: This a decent “beginners “ basketball. The manufacturer can do a better job. When fully inflated, the ball rolls to the side. Not perfectly round. Not too bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Whistle blower

customer_reviews.title: Great price to get your children OUTSIDE
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for my son's birthday party! We were trying to keep children engaged and involved without using any electronic devices. These basketballs were played with and held up well! I have had them for a month, but for this price I think they were worth it. I am not raising any future NBA stars, but I do believe my children will be outside believing they could be!
customer_reviews.author: Moore Ma

customer_reviews.title: Just not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The ball has a nice grip and seams hi quality but the seams of the ball is where the air leaks are happening and will deflate the ball in 4 min. To the credit of the company they sent me a replacement ball but after a month the air leaks on the seams happened again. Unfortunately, I am outside the return window now by two weeks and out $12. The ball is used by a 11 year old outside to shoot hoops and the ball is always kept indoors when not in use. I would not recommend buying this ball and I would just recommend spending the extra $20 and get a quality ball.
customer_reviews.author: violetrose

customer_reviews.title: NOT SUTABLE FOR KIDS
customer_reviews.text: THIS BALL IS heavy~ kids will never reach the basket. Teens mayabe... all u street jocks. nock yourself out! (don't know if it is me, but it takes more effert to bounce this ball after the first few bounces)
customer_reviews.author: Hubbs

customer_reviews.title: DANG!
customer_reviews.text: Well this was unexpected. A streetball for $10 that everybody chooses to play the game with over everyone else's balls? Should I tell them it was only $10 or just let them play? Shhh I wont say a thing
customer_reviews.author: Lifeisgood

customer_reviews.title: Street Ballin’
customer_reviews.text: Like a great many ballers, my son is specific about his routine and doesn’t like switching equipment once he’s in a groove. He’s now on his fourth NBA Street Basketball from Spalding. These are great and are really durable on the pavement. They last a long time and are super comfortable to shoot. He has great control and hits lots of 3s with this ball and has zero interest in considering anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased three of these balls from Amazon, and they've each lasted about a summer, an hour or so a day on blacktop in the heat and by the end of three or four months, the ball loses most of its grip. It's a pretty good value for something you know is not going to last very long. Playing on asphalt is inherently going to wear down any type of basketball, so the fact that this is a "street" basketball made of rubber means it's made to withstand a lot of dribbles.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality!
customer_reviews.text: My son had two basketballs that were seeing their last days so I order this for him. It’s perfect to fit in his book bag and so far has kept the right amount of air in it (I ordered it in December). He practices about 3 times a day and has about 2 games on the weekend. We have a tight schedule! This ball makes it each practice and game.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren H.

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: As expected. It is slightly "rubbery" feeling (not a leather feel). But, great for use of intermediate basketball players. We needed to pump it up a little more, as expected, to meet the recommended pressures. But, it seems to hold air, its shape, and worked for our indoor basketball season.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Pink and purple ball not indicated
customer_reviews.text: There was no indication in the product description that the ball would be pink and purple. I bought this for a charity gift drive where a boy asked for a basketball. I'm keeping it because my daughter wanted it when she saw it but now I will have to go to a brick and mortar store to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Becker

customer_reviews.title: Good but color is lighter than pictured
customer_reviews.text: The ball came inflated in a regular unlabeled brown box. I got this for my 7 year old who is just getting into playing basketball. It is the perfect size for her. I gave it a 4 star because the colors are lighter than what is pictured here.
customer_reviews.author: ore

customer_reviews.title: so I was nervous about being able to pick out a good basketball for him to shoot around with at our ...
customer_reviews.text: My fiance has played basketball most of his life, so I was nervous about being able to pick out a good basketball for him to shoot around with at our nearby outdoor court. After careful review, I choose this one because of all the positive reviews it had. Although I liked the price, I was initially leery about buying this one, as I wanted to get a really good quality basketball. However once my fiance and I received the ball, I realized I had made a great decision! I've always been told "you get what you paid for" but in this case, the quality was much more than I anticipated based on the price.
customer_reviews.author: NGibson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Wish it made more baskets, but that's on me. It's a ball, it bounces, and goes where you shoot it.... take better aim, and you'll score more hoops!
customer_reviews.author: Fishing Nut

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold air
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my son. We inflated it and it held air for about 4 days, after which it started to lose enough air every day to not be usable anymore. Not sure if I can get a refund or not - All I have is the ball and I don't recall if there was any special packaging with it.
customer_reviews.author: PinAZ

customer_reviews.title: Spalding NBA Street Outdoor Basketball
customer_reviews.text: Just what my son was looking for! Ball came perfectly inflated and with great grips since he had been using an older basketball that lost its grips. Regulation size and cannot wait to use this Street basketball outside all year! Highly recommended. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: CODJ2013

customer_reviews.title: Can't hold air
customer_reviews.text: Okay ball but it doesn't seem to hold air very well and has to be filled with air pretty often. It would be a great outdoor ball if it held air. It constantly sounds like it's flat even when it has air. I would recommend getting a different ball over this one though this one is durable if you want to fill it up every time you play.
customer_reviews.author: Leaf

customer_reviews.title: spend more money for a better ball
customer_reviews.text: At first I as in live with this ball! I couldn’t believe the price for how it felt. Man, just a month later and the ball has almost no gripping left on it. I play maybe 30 minutes a day outside 4-5 days a week with my kids. It should have lasted a little longer than this. Not impressed
customer_reviews.author: P. Burchfield

customer_reviews.title: Still going
customer_reviews.text: It has been used daily on a concrete driveway for a season in Chicago, stored inside garage, most of the time. All the black is gone and is almost smooth, slightly out of round, but still holds air and usable for general practice. For the price, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: South American Jungle Primed Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T BOUNCE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ball for the Toys for Tots program. Though the basketball arrived on time, it did not arrive in any packaging, other than the outer box it is delivered in, and the ball does not bounce any higher than my knees and I'm only 5'4"!!!!
customer_reviews.author: TheLungMD

customer_reviews.title: Stays inflated
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ball for the cost. I've inflated this one time and it's lasted about 4 months with no noticeable loss in air pressure. Plus it's not wearing down at all, and I use it 60-90 minutes per week on outdoor courts. It's very high-quality and if it continues to last for at least a year or two I will be buying another one when my current one wears down.
customer_reviews.author: SilverFox5

customer_reviews.title: On the courts again!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a basketball because it had been a while since I was last on the court. I shopped for one locally, but the price was more than I wanted to spend for such an item. When my ball was delivered, I was shocked to see that it was delivered already inflated perfectly and ready to go. I went right the courts and shot around. It's a basketball, it came inflated, it's great. Nothing more to really add to this as there was nothing that makes it 'special' but an overall great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Eb. Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for just a little cash
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the quality considering this ball was just $10 and change. Arrived on time, fully inflated and ready to go and has a nice, even bounce. This one is just as good as the $19 ball you see all the time at the big-box membership stores. Would definitely buy again, but I'm confident that it will be a long time before I have to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: SWJ

customer_reviews.title: Goes flat :(
customer_reviews.text: The ball has a great feel, but it won't hold air. Felt a little soft when I got it so I put a little more air in it. Shot some and it has a nice feel to it (a little "grippy") But I put it down for a week, and when I picked it up again to go out and shoot, it was even lower than when it arrived. It looks like the little do hickey where you put the air in was not properly inserted when the ball was made. Other than that, I like the ball. Oh well, it has to go back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine. Good ball.
customer_reviews.text: Look simply put. I needed a quality basketball for my 7yr old daughter to play with while we are at stuck at home. It arrived fully inflated and bounces just fine. I’m keeping it inside everyday to prevent sun from baking it and it seems to be working just fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Scott T.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's old basketball had developed several hernias over the past year and it was time for a new one. We decided on this one based on price as well as reviews and it arrived yesterday on time and it was fully inflated. She shot about 1,000 shots with it yesterday and so far it's holding up nicely. We use these at school in our elementary PE classes and have had them for over 5 years without any defects.
customer_reviews.author: Lydic

customer_reviews.title: Great, but not the best for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but not durable enough to withstand concrete pavements. After about 40 days of use, the grip is completely worn down and there are some micro tears in the ball, causing the air to slowly deflate. I would have hoped that it would have lasted longer than it did.
customer_reviews.author: NOLA Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too much bounce
customer_reviews.text: Got this ball for outdoor play. Nice grip and mine holds air just fine. Has not lost shape. My problem is that it has way too much bounce and flies off the rim/backboard on missed shots. It's like shooting hoops with a red playground ball. I though maybe I pumped it too much, but when I let some air out, then it felt too flat for dribbling. Maybe I'm just used to the indoor balls I play with (I own an Evolution and play with The Rock a lot), but this one felt all wrong to me.
customer_reviews.author: s_bk

customer_reviews.title: No packaging - just a ball in a box
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift - wish I had known there would be no merchandise packaging. Ball looks new & in good condition but it feels like I'm giving a gift I picked out of my garage last minute. Description should list there's no official packaging. Colors are much lighter than pictured. Fine for a 7 year old I guess.
customer_reviews.author: christen bryant

customer_reviews.title: Ball in a box
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for a foster child. The basketball was perfect. It arrived as a ball in a square shipping box. Since the gifts are donated anonymously I have no idea how it works for the child. I bounced it a few times, and it seem good to me (no leaks, not flat, etc.). Would purchase again if I had the need.
customer_reviews.author: CRedFL

customer_reviews.title: Damaged out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: This item was damaged out of the box. We thought it was flat and needed air. We pumped it up multiple times and it continued to go flat. I thought I’d return/exchange it but that is not allowed through Amazon/this seller as you have to contact the manufacturer to return the item. We had no luck with getting any response from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: WhitneyC

customer_reviews.title: Have held air well
customer_reviews.text: Got 3 for the kids at Xmas. Its been cold weather, and they haven't had any air issues. Its a good rubber basketball, much better than one of the $10 Red/Blue/Orange/ or lime green ones you might grab off the shelf at Wally World.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Bassham

customer_reviews.title: Come deflated
customer_reviews.text: Wish I read all the reviews. First it comes just in a box with no packaging not able to give as a gift. Second it comes deflated so we have pumped it up twice and let it sit over night and both times the next day it was flat. Bought this to give as a gift for a child in an orphanage he would not have access to a pump. Returning and going to Target to buy one I can give
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A favorite gift for our granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: We gave gift to our 12 yr old granddaughter. It is excellent quality and women's basketball regulation size. We paired it with a pump and needles. She loves playing with her brothers, her friends and even with her Poppy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashburn, Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Rethink this item
customer_reviews.text: Bought “identical” one a few years ago so I reordered it. Material is completely different (cheap plastic) and seams had holes so it wouldn’t hold air. Disappointed. My suggestion is to pay a little more to get the right quality
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much garbage,
customer_reviews.text: The one you want is 'Spalding NBA Zi/O Excel Basketball'. From actually owning and trying a bunch of different indoor/outdoor balls, the one I just mentioned compared to the one you are looking at: It costs about ten bucks more but also lasts about ten times longer so you do the math..
customer_reviews.author: Kasra Kamooneh

product_meta.title: Spalding NBA Street Outdoor Basketball
product_meta.description: Street ball will never die. Built for summer tournaments and Saturdays at the park, the NBA Street outdoor basketball holds to the NBA official size and weight. It has a deep channel design to give you proper grip and a durable rubber cover that stands up to asphalt or concrete.
feature_bullets: Deep channel design for superior control

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
